contentList.content:
Destroy [1] and apply Acid and Atrophy to characters in a cone.

Also creates a Cursed Poison surface.
|Smash your weapon into the ground, damaging all non-allied characters in a cone in front of you for [1] damage and knocking them down. Clears non-cursed surfaces and clouds.|

Spray oil in a cone, dealing [1] and creating an Oil surface.

Characters without Magic Armour become Petrified, preventing them from taking action, and Oiled, reducing Earth Resistance by [2]% and Fire Resistance by [3]%.
|Smash your weapon into the ground, damaging all non-allied characters in a cone in front of you for [1] damage and knocking them down. Clears non-cursed surfaces and clouds.|
If you change your mind, I'll be here. And remember - the balance must be preserved.
Mortals need the earth just as it needs them. We Grovetenders exist to preserve the balance of nature. Perhaps you can aid us in our conquest...

Shrooms cover target area, applying Spore to nearby characters.

Spore reduces Poison Resistance by [1]% and Earth Resistance by [2]%. Also reduces Movement Speed by [3]%.

Shrooms cover target area, applying Spore to nearby characters.

Spore reduces Poison Resistance by [1]% and Earth Resistance by [2]%. Also reduces Movement Speed by [3]%.
Le personnage subira les dommages causés par les attaques, les surfaces et les états de <font color='#65C900'>poison</font>.
Le personnage subit des dégâts réduits.
Le personnage est infecté par des parasites.
Ne peut pas attaquer, lancer des sorts ou interagir avec des objets.
Le personnage est actuellement infecté par des <font color='#65C900'>spores</font> affaiblissantes.
Ne peut pas attaquer, lancer des sorts ou interagir avec des objets.

Launch 5 toxic spores, each dealing [1], creating a Cursed Poison cloud, and applying Spore.

Spore reduces Poison Resistance by [2]% and Earth Resistance by [3]%. Also reduces Movement Speed by [4]%.

Blast dust at all nearby enemies, dealing [1] and Blinding them.

The dust also clears all Surfaces.

Hurl a vial of tainted liquid, applying Poison to characters.

Undead enemies become Corrupted, causing them to take damage from all poison sources and restore vitality from healing sources for 2 turns.
Thread a volley of enchanted rocks, dealing a total of [2] and <font color='#C7A758'>Petrifying</font> the target.
Thread a volley of enchanted rocks, dealing a total of [2] and <font color='#C7A758'>Petrifying</font> the target.

Hurl a ball of venom, dealing [1] to the target.

Deals an additional [2] if the target is Poisoned.

Launch a toxic spore, dealing [1], creating a Cursed Poison cloud, and applying Spore.

Spore reduces Poison Resistance by [2]% and Earth Resistance by [3]%. Also reduces Movement Speed by [4]%.

Throw a poisonous dart, dealing [1] to all characters and creating a Poison surface.

Also Poisons hit characters.

Range: [2]
Poisoned deals poison damage over time.
Can target terrain to create ooze surface.

Oil-filled rocks crash into all nearby enemies, each dealing [1] and creating an Oil surface.

Characters also become Oiled, reducing Earth Resistance by [2]% and Fire Resistance by [3]%.

Throw a rock filled with sticky oil, dealing [1] to all characters and creating an Oil surface.

Characters also become Oiled, reducing Earth Resistance by [2]% and Fire Resistance by [3]%.

Throw a rock filled with sticky oil, dealing [1] to all characters and creating an Oil surface.

Characters also become Oiled, reducing Earth Resistance by [2]% and Fire Resistance by [3]%.

Throw dust at target location, dealing [1] and Blinding all characters.

The dust also clears all Surfaces.

A large boulder crashes down, dealing [1] and applying Lost Footing to all characters.

Removes Petrified, dealing an additional [2] if it is removed this way.

Setting Lost Footing on an enemy who already has Lost Footing will set Knocked Down if either Armour type is depleted.

Pummel the ground, causing a quake to deal [1] to enemies and create Oil surfaces in the area.

Enemies without Physical Armour are Knocked Down, otherwise Lost Footing is applied instead.

Setting Lost Footing on an enemy who already has Lost Footing will set Knocked Down if either Armour type is depleted.

Muster a downpour at the target area, creating water surfaces which spread and douse flames.

Sets Wet on all characters.

Radius: [1]
Duration: [2]
Creates water puddles on terrain, douses fires, and makes characters wet. Wet makes target less resistant to air spells but more resistant to fire spells.
Ride a rock towards target location, dealing [1] to enemies you pass within 2m.

Deal [1] to enemies and undead allies around you and applying Poison to them.

Also creates a Poison surface beneath you.

Transforms Water and Blood surfaces into their Poison counterpart.

Each ally consumes Oil surfaces around them, restoring Physical Armour based on the surface consumed this way.

Each ally becomes Fortified for 1 turn, granting [1].

Cleanses Slowed, Oiled, Shocked, and Chilled on-cast.

Bestow an earthern enchantment to all allies within 7m, granting Physical Armour Regeneration and [1] for 3 turns.

The enchantment also provides Slowed Immunity for its duration.

Bestow an earthern enchantment to all allies within 7m, granting Physical Armour Regeneration and [1] for 3 turns.

The enchantment also provides Slowed Immunity for its duration.

Cover your weapon with sticky oil, adding [1] to your weapon attacks.

Basic attacks will Oil characters for 1 turn if they are not already Oiled.

Unleash judgement unto allies and enemies around you.

Ally: Gains Ironbark for 3 turns, providing [1], [2]% Earth Resistance, and [3]% Physical Resistance.

Whilst affected by Ironbark, characters become immune to Knocked Down and Bleeding.

Enemy: Transform into a harmless woodland critter for 1 turn provided either Armour type is depleted.

Shapeshift into a Clay Sentinel.

Whilst in this form, you gain an additional:
• [1]% Vitality
• [2]% Physical Armour
• [3]% Earth Resistance
• [4]% Physical Resistance
• [5]% Movement Speed

Deals [1] to and Entangle all nearby enemies, preventing movement and dealing [2] each turn.

Gain Ironbark, providing [3], [4]% Earth Resistance, and [5]% Physical Resistance. Also grants immunity to Knocked Down and Bleeding.

Consume Oil surfaces around you, restoring Physical Armour based on the surface consumed this way.

Grants the user Fortified, granting [1] for 1 turn.

Cleanses Slowed, Oiled, Shocked, and Chilled on-cast.

Noxous fumes burst around the caster, dealing [1] and creating Poison clouds in the area.

The caster also receives Earth Immunity.

Shatter a portion of your armour, dealing [1] on-cast and applying Bleeding.

This damage is based on your current Physical Armour.

Absorb all Poison surfaces around you, restoring Vitality (regardless of being Undead) based on the surface area consumed this way.

Siphon Poison also adds [1] to your weapon attacks.

Coat your weapon with a deadly concoction, adding [1] to your weapon attacks.

Basic attacks will Spore characters for 1 turn if they are not already Spored.
Gain <font color='#65C900'>Venom Aura</font>, granting <font color='#65C900'>Venom Coating</font> to <font color='#88a25b'>allies</font> within 8m, adding [1] to their weapon attacks.

Fabricate a Poison Elemental at target location. The Elemental lasts 5 turns and is a mid-range caster.

At 10 Summoning, the Elemental increases in size and gains additional stats.

Fabricate a Earth Elemental at target location. The Elemental lasts 5 turns and is a bulky brute.

At 10 Summoning, the Elemental increases in size and gains additional stats.

Create an Oil surface at target location.

Characters also become Oiled, reducing Earth Resistance by [2]% and Fire Resistance by [3]%.
Destroy [1] and apply <font color='#00aa00'>Acid</font> to target character.

Rocks form a defensive barrier around the target, providing [1] and preventing them from being teleported.

Cleanses Poisoned, Bleeding, Burning, Acid, and Decaying from the target.

Deals [1] to the target.

The target is cleansed of Poisoned, Acid, and Entangled, taking additional damage for each removed this way:

Poisoned: [2]
Acid: [3]
Entangled: [4]

Encase your target in a stony barrier for 2 turns, providing [1] and [4]% max. Armour. Granite Plating also provides [2]% Earth Resistance at the cost of [3]% Water Resistance.

Removes Shocked, Stunned, and Dazed.

Whilst encased, the target is immune to Slowed and Petrified.

Restore 50% of the target's Physical Armour (plus bonuses).

Cleanses Crippled, Blinded, Bleeding, Taunted, Diseased, Decaying, and Atrophy from the target.

Target and Poison a nearby character, dealing [1].

The target also becomes Spored, reducing Poison Resistance by [2]% and Earth Resistance by [3]%. Also reduces Movement Speed by [4]%.

Target and Slow a nearby character, dealing [1].

The target also becomes Oiled, reducing Earth Resistance by [2]% and Fire Resistance by [3]%.

Target and Slow a nearby character, dealing [1].

The target also becomes Oiled, reducing Earth Resistance by [2]% and Fire Resistance by [3]%.

Deal [1] and infect the target.

Upon death or after one turn, the character will explode, dealing [2] in a 3m radius, setting Poisoned and Terrified to the host and each enemy hit in the area.

The Expunge skill purges the infection early.

Rock spikes impale all characters, dealing [1] and creating an Oil surface.

Characters without Physical Armour become Crippled, preventing movement.

Frenzied vines deal [1] to each character in the area.

Characters without Magic Armour become Entangled, preventing movement and dealing [2] each turn.
Draw an impassable wall of <font color="#65C900">vines</font>, spanning up to [1] and lasting 2 turns. This wall creates a <font color="#65C900">Poison cloud</font>.
